pageProduct.name: OptiSlim VLCD Bar Caramel Crunch 5
pageProduct.description:
General Information

The Optislim VLCD (very low calorie diet) Caramel Crunch bar is a nutritionally balanced total meal replacement designed for people requiring a practical weight management program. It contains all your daily nutritional requirements, including 25 vitamins and minerals when you use three bars per day. Remember to maintain adequate fluid intake.  We recommend that a minimum of 2 litres of water is consumed per day

Warnings

This product should not be used by pregnant, nursing and lactating women or by infants, children and adolescents, except when medically indicated. Please be advised that if you have any  medical conditions, you should consult your Healthcare Professional prior to commencing a VLCD weight loss program

Ingredients

Chocolate Coating [Sugar, Vegetable Fat, Soy Protein Isolate, Cocoa Powder, Milk Solids Emulsifiers (322, 476), Flavour], Glucose Syrup, Soy Protein Nuggets (Soy Protein Isolate, Tapioca Starch, Salt), Soy Protein Isolate, Apple Juice Concentrate, Glycerine, Vitamin Blend [Vitamin A, Vitamin C, Thiamine, Riboflavin, Niacin, Calcium, Iron, Vitamin D3, Vitamin E, Vitamin B6, Folic Acid, Vitamin B12, Phosphorus, Iodine, Magnesium, Zinc, Copper, Biotin, Pantothenic Acid, Manganese, Chromium, Selenium, Molybdenum], Canola Oil, Puffed Rice [Rice Flour, Sugar, Salt, Emulsifier (471), Water], Vegetable Fat Powder [Sunflower Oil, Glucose Syrup (from Wheat), Milk Protein, Emulsifier (472), Antioxidants (304, 306), Acidity Regulator (330)], Flavour, Salt, Emulsifier (322), Sweetener (Sucralose).
PRODUCT CONTAINS: SOY, MILK AND WHEAT (GLUTEN). MAY CONTAIN TRACES OF: PEANUTS, TREE NUTS, SESAME AND SULPHITES.

Directions

Replace each meal with 1 bar 3 times a day. One serve of the Optislim VLCD bar can be replaced with one serve of any other product in the VLCD range.

To achieve a healthy weight it is important you live a healthy lifestyle. Whilst various products may be of assistance in achieving your weight loss aims, eating a healthy energy-controlled diet and ensuring you engage in sufficient and appropriate physical activity will help you on your journey to a healthier you.
